XXtarkrsau:2509: viśeṣaṇāt dharmimātrasambandhyeva vyāpakaṃ sāmānyaṃ sat viśiṣṭatāpratiṣṭhaṃ pratīyate ---
XXtarkrsau:2510: dhūmo 'tra --- 'yatra dhūmastatrāgnirya [P5B/4] thā --- mahānasa' iti sādhyadharmasāmānyena dharmimātrayogavyavacchedaṃ smaratādhūmo 'tra
XXtarkrsau:2511: varttamānaḥ sādhyadharmasāmānyanāntarīyaka' iti pakṣayogavyavacchinnastasya dharmasāmānyaṃ pratīyate |
XXtarkrsau:2514: yadyatropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sat nopalabhyate sa tatrāsadvyavahāraviṣayaḥ siddho yathā --- turaṅgamottamāṅge śṛṅgam !
XXtarkrsau:2519: "nāsti padārtho 'bhāvo na ma pramāṇaviṣaya" iti matam bauddhānām |
XXtarkrsau:2524: aparāparapratyayayogena jāyamānaṃ bhūtalaṃ 'kiñcit saghaṭaṃ kiñcit sadhaṭādanyadi'ti bhāvarūpatayā tadākārānu kāriṇā
XXtarkrsau:2526: tatpratiyogitayā nirūpyamāṇaṃ saghaṭādanyad bhūtalaṃ, ghaṭo 'tra nāsti,
XXtarkrsau:2527: [P5A/5] ghaṭavān vā na bhavatīti pratyayadvayanibandhanaṃ nirūpyate |
XXtarkrsau:2531: tathā hi 'ghaṭo 'tra nāstīti buddhinibandhanatayā na kalpanāmarhati |
XXtarkrsau:2538: yadi punarviśeṣaṇamantareṇa niyatarūpaṃ na sidhyati, na sidhyatyeva tarhi
XXtarkrsau:2539: niyataṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaṃ ca rūpamiti kiṃ kasya viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaṃ vā ?
XXtarkrsau:2543: viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaṃ vā pratyakṣeṇa ca tadākārānukāriṇā tadanyena vā pratyayenābhūtaṃ niścataṃ viśeṣaṇāntaramantareṇa |
XXtarkrsau:2545: saghaṭādanyo 'pi bhūpradeśaḥ svahetorniyatamutpannaḥ, pratyakṣeṇa tathaiva dṛṣṭvā vyavasthāpito 'stu |
XXtarkrsau:2547: 'iha bhūtale kalaśo 'san' iti pratyayo na bhūtalamātraprabhavo,
XXtarkrsau:2551: bhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ghaṭavatyapi prasaṅgasyābhāvasvīkārasya ca duratikramatvāt |
XXtarkrsau:2561: aparāparapratyayayogena saghaṭād bhūtalādanyadeva bhūtalaṃ niyatapratibhāsavaśena vyavahṛtam
XXtarkrsau:2566: pratyakṣa eva bhavatī 'tyādi vistarastu prasiddha eva |
XXtarkrsau:2575: kāryasvabhāvahetuvidherbhinnābhinnasvabhāvasya sādha kau tenopeyasya bhedādupāyo vidhisādhanau bhinnau |
XXtarkrsau:2578: yasya yatrāyattaṃ svarūpaṃ sa āpattiviṣayaṃ sādhayati |
XXtarkrsau:2580: taccāyattatvaṃ kārye tvakāraṇena karttavyatve sādhyasya ca svabhāvatve vispaṣṭamucyamāne sphurati
XXtarkrsau:2581: na saṃyogitve sati, na vā samavāyitve sati |
XXtarkrsau:2585: svabhāvapratibaddhatvaṃ hi vyāpakasya tatra bhāva eva 'vyāpyasya vā tatraiva bhāva' ityevaṃ lakṣaṇānvayavyatirekalakṣaṇo 'vinābhāva ucyate |
XXtarkrsau:2591: tathā --- tasyāpi hi kāryamevātha ca vyabhicarati bahnim |
XXtarkrsau:2610: ramo hi rasaneva pūrvakaṃ gamayati svopādānam |
XXtarkrsau:2612: yato --- yenāsau raso rasena jani [P5B/6] taḥ sa pravṛttaśaktirūpopādānarūpasahakārikāraṇo raso rasaṃ janayati |
XXtarkrsau:2615: nacānumīyamānam samānakālatayā rūpamanumāpakasya rasasya kāryahetutāṃ vyāhanti |
XXtarkrsau:2624: jalasya punaḥ sthairyamupārjitamādhāraṇātaḥ sthiraṃ jalamādhāraṃ gamayati
XXtarkrsau:2626: yat punaḥ kāraṇaṃ kāryasya na gamakam, tatpuruṣāya bādhate |
XXtarkrsau:2635: yattvaśakyaṃ tathā gantumiti doṣo na tasya saḥ |
XXtarkrsau:2647: paratve hyanumānaṃ yat sāmarthyāt tad bhaviṣyati |
XXtarkrsau:2648: ko hi hastagataṃ dravyaṃ pādagāmi kariṣyati[515]? ||
XXtarkrsau:2654: apratibaddhaśaktikaṃ hi kāraṇaṃ yena pratyakṣānupalambhena paricchidyate, tena kāryamasyāvaśyambhāvi
XXtarkrsau:2657: tena kāraṇasyāpi gamakatve kāryatvameve[516]'ti bhede sati gamakaṃ nānyadityuktaṃ bhavati
XXtarkrsau:2661: tasmād avyabhicāri gamakaṃ na tadātmakamiti ! tatrācāryeṇoktam |
XXtarkrsau:2667: tādātmyaṃ sugamaṃ neti gamakatvaṃ na vidyate[517]| |[518]
XXtarkrsau:2694: yasya yena saha tādātmyatadutpattī na staḥ, sa na tadavinābhāvī |
XXtarkrsau:2700: svabhāvahetāvantarbhāvitvāt tattādātmyalakṣaṇaḥ pratibandhavyāpakakāraṇānupūrvī ca tādātmyatadutpattibalādeva kāryavyāpyayornivṛttiṃ sādhayataḥ, pratiṣedhasiddhirapi yathoktāyā evānupalabdheḥ |
XXtarkrsau:2703: yasmin vedyamāne yasmin (yan ?) niyamena vedyate, tattasya pratiyogi |
XXtarkrsau:2712: adṛśyānupalabdheḥ sambhavādanaikāntikatvena pratiṣedhavyavahārāsiddherdṛśyānupala [P5A/8] bdhereva sā bhavatīti
XXtarkrsau:2719: tenādṛṣṭasmṛtisaṃskārātītasya pratipattṛpratyakṣasya dṛśyapratiṣedhyasya varttamānasya cānyopalabdhilakṣaṇā pratyakṣanivṛttisvabhāvānupalavdhilakṣaṇā pratyakṣanivṛttisvabhāvānupalabdhirabhāvavyavahāre hatuḥ |
XXtarkrsau:2723: pariṇāmena yogyatābhājo yogiprabhāvādvā stambhitajñānaśakterghaṭasya ghaṭate kathaṃ bhūtale pratiṣedhaḥ ? sāndhakāre, sāloke vā ?
XXtarkrsau:2726: yogināpi indriyasya viṣayasya vā jñānajanana śaktistambhasambhavāt |
XXtarkrsau:2752: na dhruvabhāvī, bhūtasyāpi bhāvasya vinā hetvantarāpekṣaṇāt |
XXtarkrsau:2765: tato viruddhayā upalavdhyā kāraṇādyanupalavdhyā ca yeṣāṃ pratiṣedha uktasteṣāṃ dṛśyānāmeva smṛtānāṃ pratiṣedhasiddhiḥ |
XXtarkrsau:2767: na pūrvaṃ, na tadā nīṃ bā dṛśyāstato na viṣeddhavyāḥ |

XXtarkrsau:2821: tadeva ca niṣidhyate tādātmyena, yad yatra niyatākāram |
XXtarkrsau:2824: piśāco vā śaśaviṣāṇaṃ vā na bhavatīti
XXtarkrsau:2830: yataḥ kvacit pramāṇaṃ vṛttaṃ tat pa[P6A/2]ricchinatti, tato
XXtarkrsau:2873: jāyate ca śaraḥ śṛṅgāt jāyate ca śarādapi |
XXtarkrsau:2878: agnīndhanasāmagrījanyo yādṛṣo dhūmo na tādṛśa eva dhūmād bhavati |

XXtarkrsau:2900: satyeva yasmin yajjanma vikāre vāpi (+yā ?) kriyā |
XXtarkrsau:2912: "yaḥ śubhāśubhakarmaṇaḥ karttā na sa phalasya bhoktā --- ataḥ kṛtanāśākṛtābhyāgamadoṣaḥ |
XXtarkrsau:2914: tad vināśāt phalaṃ na syānyasānyā (?) 'pi vā bhavet[552]| |
XXtarkrsau:2918: iti naiva pravartteta prekṣāvān phalalipsa yā |
XXtarkrsau:2926: kṣaṇānnānāgatān nātītān na varttamānatāvantaṃ kālamanavasthiteḥ kāryajanma
XXtarkrsau:2939: jñāturekasya sadbhāvād dvibhede tu kathaṃ bhavet[557]? ||"
XXtarkrsau:2950: na ca kāryakāle kāraṇānuvṛttyā ? kiñcinniṣpannatvāt kāryasya |
XXtarkrsau:2952: tasmāt--- niyataṃ prāgbhāvitvaṃ kāryāpekṣayā kāraṇatvam --- na
XXtarkrsau:2962: atrāpi niyatatvaṃ bahnāveva sati bhāvakāryasya dhūmasya |
XXtarkrsau:2965: sa ca niyamo bhāvo hetubhāvā bhāvābhyāṃ kāryabhāvābhāvau viśiṣṭau |
XXtarkrsau:2966: kāryagatabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ ca kāraṇagata[P6A/4] bhāvābhāvau viśiṣṭau 'sarvatra deśe kāle ca sarvadā vahnināntarīyaka eva dhūma' ityavadhāraṇāt
XXtarkrsau:2968: na ca sarvajño 'sau na ca na gṛhlāti kāryakāraṇayor niyamam ? yadi hi dhūmo nāgnijanyastadā sakṛdapi tato na jāyeta ? kimetat pramāṇāntaram ?
XXtarkrsau:2972: yadi nīlo dṛśyamāno 'yaṃ deśāntare kālāntare vā na nīla ihāpi varttamāno na nīlo dṛśyeta |
XXtarkrsau:2985: [564] atra sa iti visargarahitaḥ pāṭho mūlapāṭhe |
XXtarkrsau:2991: 'sa dhūmo yo bahnijanitaḥ, 'sa bahni[566]ryo dhūmajanaka' iti
XXtarkrsau:3000: bhedāntarapratikṣepābhyāṃ dharmādharmitayā vyapabhede (?) 'pi tena pāvakasya śakramūrdhnaśca yadi śaktirekā dhūmajananaṃ prati, dugdhavārinoreva kledaṃ prati svāt |
XXtarkrsau:3023: vastūnāṃ vidyate tasmāt tanniṣṭhā vastuni śrutiḥ[572]| |"
XXtarkrsau:3024: [572] vastūnāṃ vidyate.... .... śruti vā- bhā- 361 pṛ-, 3/163 kā-
XXtarkrsau:3030: 'lakṣaṇāyukter vādhāsambhave tallakṣaṇameva dū[P6A/5] ṣitaṃ syādi'ti sarvatrānāśvāsaḥ |
XXtarkrsau:3034: 'na bhinnalakṣaṇatvād yā pratyabhijñā viruddhadharmādhyāsaśūnyaviṣayā sā pramāṇam |
XXtarkrsau:3036: tatra viruddhadharmādhyā saśūnyaviṣayatvaṃ pratyabhijñāyāḥ kena siddham ? kim pramāṇāntareṇa
XXtarkrsau:3037: pratyabhijñayaiva vā ? anyena siddhau kiṃ pratyabhijñayā ? tayā siddhāvanyo 'nyāśrayaṇam |
XXtarkrsau:3047: mahitatvānyadvyāsajjyādivicāramavadhūya viśiṣṭahetuphalābhāvaniyatarūpāṇāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ prabandhamekatvenādhyavasīya sa evāhaṃ karomī 'ti vyavaharati yuktameva pravarttate |
XXtarkrsau:3058: ityatra na vauddhasya nityaṃ sattvam [P6B/5] siddham |
XXtarkrsau:3060: ākādācitkatvaṃ sattvaṃ nityamuktam, na tu sadakāraṇavannityam |
XXtarkrsau:3076: bhinnābhinnaḥ kimasyātmā ? na bhinno dravatā katham ? ||
XXtarkrsau:3098: dṛṣṭā śaktirmatā sā cet saṃ[586]vṛtyāstu yathā tathā[587]| |[588]
XXtarkrsau:3114: tādṛśāmādikāraṇaṃ tādṛśaṃ sarvathā dṛṣṭaṃ kāraṇaṃ na vyabhicarati kāryātmā [P6A]6] na tu yajjātīyaṃ kāryaṃ tajjātīyameva kāraṇamapi |
XXtarkrsau:3116: ākārabheda eva kāraṇānāṃ tattvātattvanibandhanam, api tu svabhāvāntaramapi
XXtarkrsau:3124: anuvarttakaḥ kāryasya svabhāvo 'nuvarttanīyo yaḥ sa kāraṇasvabhāvaḥ |
XXtarkrsau:3140: kāryamutpadyate yasmāt sa kāryotpādo yogyatāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ |
XXtarkrsau:3142: bhāvā[595]militāstāvadbhyo 'nyānapekṣaṇāt kāryo [P6B/6] tpādanayogyatvasya sādhyasya sāmagrīsādhanadharmasattāmātrabhābitbena samagrasya hetoḥ sādhanatayā sammatasya svabhāvahetutvamuktam |
XXtarkrsau:3143: [595] vo iti likhitvā okāramātrā chinneva mūlapāṭhe |
XXtarkrsau:3148: tadūrdhvam ---bhāratasyānubandhino dharaṇi-dhāmādayaḥ kāryotpādāt pūrvaṃ sahakārivyapadeśabhājaḥ parasparopakāritvena ekakāryakāritvena ca |
XXtarkrsau:3163: na sahāmahe punaḥ, kāranaiḥ kāryasya vyabhicārāt |
XXtarkrsau:3164: ādyātiśayakrameṇa sāmagrīphalabhūtāḥ yāḥ śaktayaḥ, tāsāṃ pariṇāmastāvat |
XXtarkrsau:3165: tasya matāntare ca pratibandhavaikalyayoḥ sambhavena kārye kāraṇānāṃ vyabhicāraḥ |
XXtarkrsau:3169: yogyatāyāmapi ātmīyābhiniveśapūrvakā rāgādayo na dehendriyabuddhimātrā bhavitumarhati |
XXtarkrsau:3195: kadācid dveṣasyāpi snigdhaṃ rūrkṣa ca vacanaṃ kāryam |
XXtarkrsau:3196: ataḥ, kāryamātrād vacanamātrād rāgasya viśiṣṭasya kāraṇasyānumānaṃ pramāṇābhāsam rāgamantareṇāpi vacanasya sambhavāt |
XXtarkrsau:3198: pakvānyetāni phalāni madhurarasāni vā samānarūpatvādekaśākhāprabhāvād vā upayuktaphalavat
XXtarkrsau:3220: sarva eva vastusambandhā janakasyeva prayogaviśeṣavaśāt pravibhāgena kāryakāraṇabhāvād vyavasthāpyante
XXtarkrsau:3230: yaḥ punaraviśeṣeṇa sarvasya tasya kāraṇamātrādeva bhāvo, yathā-vastutvasya |
XXtarkrsau:3234: dṛṣṭanivṛttīnāṃ vā bhāvānaṃ yathā nāśo hetvantarānapekṣo janmānantaraṃ vyavahtriyate |
XXtarkrsau:3238: rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ prakārāṇāṃ vināśadarśanena teṣu ca [607]deśakālāntariteṣu yadi kṛtakeṣu śaṅkā syād dṛṣṭasteṣāṃ sbabhāvena
XXtarkrsau:3245: yadi nāma kālo nāma mahābhūtādivyatirikto nāsti tathāpi taireva vyavahāro bhaviṣyati |
XXtarkrsau:3254: yato rūpādīnāṃ yadi deśakālāvasthāsu kāsu[609]cideva vināśaḥ syāt, tadā tatsāpekṣo vināśo nirapekṣatayā pratīto na syāt |
XXtarkrsau:3270: sa kriṃ svabhābo 'stu yuṣmākam? yasmād bauddhairavadhṛto dravyādipadārthagaṇaḥ |
XXtarkrsau:3275: tasmāt sarvasya bhāvasya sambandho nāsti bhāvataḥ |"
XXtarkrsau:3278: "rūpaśleṣo hi sambandho dvitve sati kathaṃ bhavet ?
XXtarkrsau:3281: arthasambandhino bhinnasvabhāvau bhāvau staḥ, tarhi rūpasaṃśleṣāyāstā jalāñjaliriti
